scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:test-happ && concurrently "cd ui/ && npm run build:watch" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.launch:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS ./workdir/sensemaker-enabled/provider-sensemaker.happ -w --ui-path ui/dist network mdns
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cd tests/ && npm run test
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/sensemaker-enabled/provider-sensemaker.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a provider network mdns" "npm run playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run build:ui && cd nh-launcher-applet/ && npm run package:ui && cd ../ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.postinstall: npm run download-sensemaker && npm run download-hrea-obs && npm run download-hrea-specification && npm run download-hrea-agent
scripts.clean:build: rimraf ui/.rollup.cache; rimraf nh-launcher-applet/.rollup.cache; rm nh-launcher-applet/ui.zip; exit 0
scripts.clean:downloaded: npm run clean:downloaded:sensemaker; npm run clean:downloaded:hrea-modules; exit 0
scripts.clean:downloaded:hrea-modules: rimraf workdir/hrea_observation.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_specification.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_agent.dna
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules; for DIR in $(find -type d -iname node_modules); do echo "  Remove $DIR"; rm -Rf "$DIR"; done
scripts.clean: npm run clean:downloaded; npm run clean:build; npm run clean:modules
